title: Pocono memories: Yesterdays Photo 926
text: Posted Oct. 17, 2015 at 7:11 PM Updated at 8:27 AM Posted Oct. 17, 2015 at 7:11 PM Updated at 8:27 AM Â» Social News Do you recognize the women shown in this photo? Share your knowledge and appreciation of the past with our readers. Responses will appear in the following Sunday's newspaper. Mail typewritten answers to Yesterdays Photo, Pocono Record Library, 511 Lenox St., Stroudsburg, PA 18360; fax 570-421-6284; or email library@poconorecord.com. Include your name, town and phone number (not for publication). Description of the photo and accompanying memories should be no longer than 50 words. poconorecord.com Posted Oct. 17, 2015 at 7:11 PM Updated at 8:27 AM
